      • loadAllByIssueType

        java.util.List<TMailTemplateConfigBean> loadAllByIssueType(java.lang.Integer issueType,
                                                         java.lang.Integer projectType,
                                                         java.lang.Integer project)
        Gets all the TMailTemplateConfigBeans for issueType, projectType and project
        Parameters:
        issueType - can be null, in this case the result it is not filtered by issueType
        projectType - include into filtering even if null
        project - include into filtering even if null
        Returns:

      • loadAllByProjectType

        java.util.List<TMailTemplateConfigBean> loadAllByProjectType(java.lang.Integer projectType)
        Gets all the TMailTemplateConfigBeans which have a projectType specified
        Parameters:
        projectType - if specified filter by projectType otherwise only be sure to not to be null (all projectType specific configurations)
        Returns:
